titles.title: Providing for consideration of motions to suspend the rules.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 107-87, by Mr. Hastings (WA).

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 38.

action.text: Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 163, H. Res. 156 is laid on the table.

bill.summary: 6/5/2001--Reported to House without amendment. Makes it in order at any time on June 6, 2001, for the Speaker of the House of Representatives to entertain motions that the House suspend the rules on the following measures: (1) H.R. 1000 (William Howard Taft National Historic Site boundary adjustment); (2) H.R. 37 (National Historic Trails feasibility studies); (3) H.R. 640 (Santa Monica Mountains National Recreation Area boundary adjustment); (4) H.R. 1661 (Dungeness crab fishery management authority extension); (5) H.R. 1209 (alien child status classification); (6) H.R. 1914 (farmer bankruptcy protection extension); and (7) H. Con. Res. 150 (commemorating the first blind person to climb Mount Everest).
